text: (Narakavacikalum corkkavacikalum akiya) ivviruvarukkumitaiyil oru matil irukkum. Anta matilin cikarattil cila manitarkal irupparkal. (Narakavaci corkkavaciyakiya) ovvoruvaraiyum avarkalin (mukak) kuriyaik konte ivarkal arintu kolvarkal. Ivarkal corkkavacikalai nokki â€˜â€˜(iraivanutaiya) cantiyum camatanamum unkal mitu untakuka!'' Enru captamittuk kuruvarkal. (Cikarattil irukkum) ivarkal (ituvaraiyilum) corkkattil nulaiyavillai. Eninum, avarkal (atil nulaivatai) mika avalutan acaippattuk kontirupparkal
